name: dm1cosscnvepres

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))), cuni(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))), crn(cres(ccnv(cep), c0)))
-| wceq(crn(cres(ccnv(cep), c0)), cuni(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))), cuni(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))), crn(cres(ccnv(cep), c0)))
-| wceq(crn(cres(ccnv(cep), c0)), cuni(c0))

|- wceq(cdm(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))), cuni(c0))
-| wceq(crn(cres(ccnv(cep), c0)), cuni(c0))

comment: The domain of cosets of the restricted converse epsilon relation is the union of the restriction. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 18-May-2019.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 26-Sep-2021.)
